DataElement.preferredName: Substance Abuse Tobacco Use Past Year Questionnaire Assessment Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Maladaptive pattern of drug or alcohol use that may lead to social, occupational, psychological, or physical problems._Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._Before the present time._A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.
